marginalia.anchor_text: iudicauerit ex genitura tantum, non secus ac sortilegus ex interrogatione pronunciabit

position.marginalia_text: Contra co[mmun]em astrologoru[m] praxim q[u]i statim, inspecta genitura, de reb[us] omnib[us] judiciu[m] ferre no[n] dubitabunt

marginalia.translation: Against the common practice of the astrologers [who] at once, with the genitures inspected, do not hesitate to take up the judgement about all things.

underline.text: Ob haec igitur animi & corporis ornamenta, exigua quidem apud homines, egregia eutem & maxima Ã¢ conditore facta sunt, & potentissimis causis subiacent
ex genitura tantum, non secus ac
si uero de genitura, animi & corporis
